system.description:
This is a a backpack that bears a very similar outward appearance to a normal backpack or day pack, but has MOLLE attachments hidden in a secret compartment. The secret compartment is itâ€™s own compartment and does not affect or use the capacity of the standard compartment, granting a +15 bonus to stealth checks when hiding any weapon or object within it. The secret compartment can be revealed for 3 Combat Points. The medium pack can hold 12 lbs of objects that are Medium or smaller size and has 6 MOLLE slots.

This pack fits comfortably over one shoulder in a messenger type style or on both shoulders in a traditional pack type. The Small, Medium, and Large packs have plate compartments, allowing them to use a set of armor plates, but the bag grants the installed armor plates DR against attacks that come from a single direction that the wearer specifies, and armor points are lost and damage is applied as if it were worn armor. These bags can not take advantage of any MOLLE carrier pouches that hold armor plates. These plates are not considered Armor in the traditional sense, and can be worn over any other armor or clothing.
